Text: (How strange...)

I'm Nu and a member of Shadow Garden, called upon to
fight the Cult of Diablos.

I'm honored that Lady Alpha, who keeps the
organization together, appreciates my skills.

I sense that something is amiss. Something has
happened...and it's nothing trivial.
This is inconceivable. How did you get in here...?
What's inconceivable?
What...?!
(I-I didn't feel anything at all...!)
M-Master Shadow...!
Hm? Call me Cid. Now's not the time for games.

U-Understood... Allow me to call you Master Cid,
then.
You were saying?
Huh?

You said, "This is inconceivable." What did you mean
exactly?
Oh, that...

(Is it all right to report something like this?
I might get scolded for it, but...)

(After all, nothing in this world can be hidden from
Master Shadow's eyes...)
After some hesitation, Nu addresses Cid.
There's...an intruder on the rooftop.
An intruder?!
Huh?
....N-Never mind.
Are you allowing rats to break in?
M-My apologies!

Mitsugoshi is the most important fund base for
Shadow Garden's operations, and it also has a
flawless facade to deceive the public.
It's a complete disgrace...to allow a break-in.

These mere words trigger a sense of intimidation.
If she isn't careful, she'll be crushed.
We must eliminate intruders...
Wh-What do you...!
Hmm? Is there a reason why you can't eliminate them?

(In Shadow Garden, Master Cid's commands are final.
But...)

M-Master Shadow! Pl-Please hear me out! That's not
the case, you see...!
Huh?
Please wait a moment!

In an instant, Nu rushes over and crouches down to
pick up a small animal lurking in the shadows.
When I said intruder, I meant this cat...
Meooow.
...So the intruder was a cat, not a mouse.
That's right...
A cat... That's what you meant by 'intruder'...
U-Umm...?

I don't know where that cat came from, but it must be
a stray, right?

We've already confirmed that no one from Mitsugoshi
is the cat's owner.
I see.
It has nice fur.
Quite a few staff members enjoy playing with it...
Everyone's taking care of it, huh?
You too, Nu?
...I guess the secret is out.
The cat seems pretty fond of you and all.
Meooow.

A-Anyway, the problem is that the cat has been on
the roof, although no one recalls bringing it here.
Is it so unusual for a cat to be on a roof?

The building's design lets cats climb down easily,
but it's difficult for them to go up it.

Moreover, when I notice it's gone, before I know it,
it's back on the roof again.

This means that there are access routes that even
Shadow Garden members are unaware of.

In other words, someone else who uses that route
to enter Mitsugoshi might've brought the cat to
the roof.
I guess that'd be it, wouldn't it?
Yes, I believe so. And that means...

That someone who knows the entry route to Mitsugoshi
can get in without being detected by security.
I guess one cat should be fine.

This is more serious than a mere cat breaking in.
That's how I see it.

This is a grave threat to both Mitsugoshi and Shadow
Garden!

Aren't you overreacting a bit? Just because cats can
get in doesn't mean people can too.
The cat lets out a small yawn while being held.

Just look. I doubt anyone would mind such a cute
little thing breaking in, right?
Uh, it's cute, but... That's beside the point!
Everyone takes care of it, right?
Um...yeah, that's true, but...
Including you, right?
Y-Yes, you're right... B-But!

This isn't the time for me to feel mushy about how
adorable the cat is!
You're pretty mushy right now.
I-It's unavoidable.

Anyway, we can't just leave it at that. We have to
find out exactly how this cat got on the roof...!

I'll take responsibility for finding out how it got
here! Do I have your permission?

Uh, sure, that's fine. Best of luck. If it makes you
feel any better, Nu, then go for it.

Thank you very much. I'm determined to do everything
in my power.

(Since Master Shadow gave me a direct order, I must
not make any mistakes...)

(Who is bringing the cat here, and why...? I'll find
out for sure!)
So, what do you plan to do first?

Let's see... I think I'll start out with night
patrols.
So you think they're breaking in at night?

Apparently, cats are more active at night, so I
assume it would enter when it's dark.
Hmm, I see.
Let's meet on the rooftop when night falls, then.
Huh? What do you mean...?
W-Would you like to investigate with me?

Yeah, I don't have any other plans, and I think
something interesting might happen.

I just gotta head back to the dormitory, then I'll
join you.
Ah...
(Did he say something interesting might happen...?)

(Maybe Master Shadow already has an idea of who the
intruder is...?)

(It might be true. He did reassure me that there's no
need to worry about a single cat. Maybe he was
planning to investigate by himself from the start...)

(But since I stubbornly asked to investigate, that
might've worried him enough to investigate too...)

(Ah... I'm glad that he's concerned about me, but at
the same time, my immaturity is irritating.)
What's with that stern look on your face?
O-Oh! It's nothing.

So, Master Shadow... Oops, I mean Master Cid,
I'll be waiting for you here tonight.

All right. You don't need to be so uptight, though,
you know.

(Ah, you're so kind, but as a member of Shadow Garden,
I will finish this mission myself!)
